job_description:
Lambert is seeking a Jr. Front-end Developer to join our award-winning Fairly Painless™ creative team in Michigan. Lambert is the state’s largest independent marketing agency and a national leader in consumer, financial/investment, automotive and education sectors. We offer a great place to continue building your career as a front-end developer as we offer immediate opportunities to work with client teams managing a roster of national (and global) companies and household brands. The role also offers the potential to utilize your web design skills for the right candidate. Our team is growing and is seeking an individual who wants to grow professionally while contributing to a culture rooted in creative collaboration and design excellence. If you are a motivated individual with 1-3 years of web design and development experience building WordPress websites, please consider submitting your resume to become part of our amazing team.

Essential Responsibilities And Duties

Web development - HTML, CSS, and Javascript competency required
Website maintenance and troubleshooting
Site auditing
Analytics and reporting (Google Analytics, Search Console, site testing tools)

The ideal candidate…

Web design, UI and UX skills a major plus
Excellent communication skills and the ability to speak in a professional and clear way directly to Clients.
Exhibits a roll up your sleeves, proactive approach to new concepts and difficult situations
Self-motivated
Creativity - practice out-of-the-box thinking to come up with fresh solutions
Collaboration – ability to work on a team
Flexibility – willing and open to change as well as challenge the status quo with clients and with teammates
Results-oriented, critical thinking, sound decision-making
Commitment to continuous improvement and learning new things
Demonstrates ability to give and receive effective feedback

Required Qualifications And Skills

Approximately 1-3 Years of web development, web design experience
HTML, CSS, Javascript competency

Preferred Qualifications And Skills

Web design, UX and UI knowledge
Experience building custom Wordpress sites using ACF
Competent with Adobe Photoshop
Google Analytics experience
Experience setting up or troubleshooting API connections

Some Of The Benefits And Perks Working Here Include…

Health, dental, vision, and life insurance
Paid Parental Leave
401(k) match potential and flex accounts
Flexible work schedules and Summer Hours
Hybrid work environment
Profit-sharing and bonus opportunities
Professional development
Career advancement opportunities

We welcome your consideration for this role and look forward to connecting with you!

Lambert is proud to celebrate an inclusive culture and welcomes candidate’s perspectives, experiences, and backgrounds. We are an equal opportunity employer and we understand that by assembling a diverse and inclusive work force allows for a more open exchange of ideas, solutions, and progress.

This job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensive listing of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee. Duties, responsibilities and activities may change, or new ones may be assigned at any time with or without notice.
